definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: is this, kind of, green glass line in the middle of the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 是一條在人行道中央的綠色線。

sentences.english: Cyndie crouches beside him on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: Cyndie蹲在他旁邊的人行道上。

sentences.english: Taking the garbage out and keeping the sidewalk shoveled.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾倒掉，人行道上的積雪鏟走。

sentences.english: Our brave weavers have turned their pavement grave of their slave-owners.
sentences.chinese: 我們英勇的織工已把人行道變成了他們主人的墳墓。

sentences.english: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 一個小孩正沿着人行道蹣跚行走。

sentences.english: I guess he was just born on the wrong side of the sidewalk!
sentences.chinese: 我猜他肯定是出生在人行道錯誤的那一邊。

sentences.english: One day, he saw a man coming up the sidewalk to his office.
sentences.chinese: 一天他看見一個男人正從人行道走進他的事務所。

sentences.english: Rebete, frowning at a puddle on a sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 他對着人行道上的一攤“水”直皺眉頭。

sentences.english: Do not stand on the curbside of the road.
sentences.chinese: 請不要站在道路的人行道旁。

sentences.english: I watched him step off the pavement, cross the street, and disappear into the post office.
sentences.chinese: 我看見他走下人行道，過行街，進了郵局。

sentences.english: At home, I walk on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在家的時候，我走在人行道上。

sentences.english: Inertia carried the car to the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 慣性使汽車駛到了人行道上。

sentences.english: If there is no crosswalk, stop at the edge of the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有人行橫道，以人行道的盡頭爲停車線。

sentences.english: When we walk in the street, we must walk in the sideway.
sentences.chinese: 當我們走在街上的時候，我們必須走人行道。

sentences.english: It is illegal to shake carpets in the street, or to throw orange peels on the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 在街上甩動地毯或將橘子皮丟在人行道上是違法的。

sentences.english: Autumn winds stop a girl on a sidewalk in Portland, Maine.
sentences.chinese: 秋風使一個小女孩停留在緬因州波特蘭市的人行道上。

definition: Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
pedestrian/traveler on foot/passer-by/official responsible for arranging audiences with the emperor
mixed use (e.g. pedestrians and vehicles)/joint operation (e.g. trains and buses)
